job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: The PositionltbrgtltbrgtSoftware EngineerltbrgtltbrgtWhat We NeedltbrgtltbrgtAn experienced Software Engineer to work on a crossfunctional team to solve realworld problems for healthcare providers around the country Using your technical expertise you will design build test and improve the features that will enable our customers to effectively run their business and provide patient care If you like solving tough problems being part of a fun team and are tenacious we would like to hear from youltbrgtltbrgtYour Area of FocusltbrgtltulgtltligtDesign develop document test and debug new and existing software systems and applications ltligtltligtOwn software subsystems through full development and support lifecycleltligtltligtParticipate in full development life cycle including requirements analysis and designltligtltligtPartner with manager and participate in software design meetingsltligtltligtIdentify opportunities to improve software reuse and scalabilityltligtltligtSupport maintain and document software functionalityltligtltligtPerform code reviewsltligtltligtBring creative and innovative software solutions to the team and identify and evaluate new technologies for implementationltligtltligtPartner with team to prototype refine test and debug programs to meet needsltligtltligtImprove quality and operational processesltligtltligtTriage challenging bugsltligtltligtParticipate in software design meetings and analyze user needs to determine technical requirementsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtYour Professional Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt2 years of software development experienceltligtltligtProfessional experience developing distributed databasedriven webbased applications with Java and the Spring frameworkltligtltligtStrong knowledge in computer architecture design patterns data structures algorithms and objectoriented software techniquesltligtltligtTechnical leadership with minimal supervisionltligtltligtStrong analytical skills and ability to apply them in daytoday workltligtltligtUse data to make technical recommendations and decisionsltligtltligtKey contributor to technical team discussions and engineering debatesltligtltligtAbility to accurately estimate scope on larger software projectsltligtltligtLooks beyond current execution of tasksltligtltligtProficient at debugging other engineers codeltligtltligtWorking knowledge of HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript and JavaScript frameworks Angular Node ReactltligtltligtStrong verbal and written communication skillsltbrgtltligtltulgtOur Valuesltbrgtltulgtltligt Passionate  Be Passionately Driven We take pride in our work inspire others to excel and are dedicated to solving tough problems in healthcare We hold ourselves to the highest standards And we work with urgency because what we do mattersltligtltligt CustomerFocused  Dedicated to Customer Success Helping our customers succeed directs every action we take Were committed to helping their practices run smoother so their patients can thrive We are solutionoriented and aligned with their needsltligtltligt Collaborative  Together Were Better Great teams are collaborative selfless hardworking and dedicated We are willing to do what it takes to get the job done so we can accomplish more togetherltligtltligtGrowing  Constant Growth We strive to have a growth mindset in all we do We reject the status quo We take a unique approach and make every effort to bring clarity to a needlessly complex industry We are creative problem solvers that believe in making things betterltbrgtltligtltulgtKareo is an equal opportunity employer All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to age race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin veteran or disability status
